name: Saga The Mouse SAGE 2020 Demo
description:
THE MOUSE IS HERE!
That`s right and he`s running N rolling into SAGE 2020!

An orange robot named ROBO MOUSE used the key to reopen DANGERLAND, and it`s up to SAGA to stop this
evil madness! #platformer

SONGS USED
INTRO SONG:
International Superstar Soccer Deluxe - Intro (Bass Cover)
TITLE SCREEN:
beatmania IIDX 3rd style theme
TUTORIAL THEME:
International superstar soccer 64 menu theme
THEME FOR OCEAN VIEWS ZONE:
mamorukun curse! blossom shower (First half)
THEME FOR UNDERGROUND CAVE:
Yousuke Yasui - Arabesque Etoile

PLEASE NOTE
This game is a SAGE 2020 demo and everything is NOT final to the game. I will be adding better stuff to the version.

CREDITS
Logo: MegaPonyArtX
Cutscenes: Sony Vegas Pro 11
Engine: Not So Simple Sonic Worlds for Clickteam Fusion 2.5
Sprites: GTFoxN6Y
